div.header: Enrolling K-8 for the 2020-21 School Year!:

section.p: Coastal Preparatory Academy is a K-8 tuition-free public charter school open to all residents of North Carolina. Coastal Prep is a neat place to learn! We have a classical curriculum, flexible seating, authentic learning opportunities, and we offer aÂ curriculum that is aligned to North Carolina state standards.Â At Coastal Prep we believe in whole-child learning and we value citizenship, teamwork, service-oriented actions, and scholarship.

We are enrolling students for the current school year (2019-2020) and are currently accepting applications for the next school year (2020-2021). We would love for you and your family to stop by our school to learn why our students, teachers, and community love our school!
Weâve made it easy for you to request a tour call, text or click the link below and request a date and time that you can visit our campus!

p.a: Â Â Â Â Â Â Â

section.p: CoastalÂ Preparatory Academy isÂ dedicated to improving the lives of its students by providing authentic learning experiences in a collaborative, nurturing environment that will build a foundation for studentsâ success in school, at future work, and in life.
Interested in learning more about Coastal Prep?Â Please complete theÂ prospective parent interest formÂ or call us at (910) 839-0012 and we will be happy to send you additional information!
